website_summaries.verdict: A must-have for anyone who wants a mid-sized bowl with a basic, fuss-free design and an affordable price.
pros: Combines neutral colors, sturdy porcelain, and a handy spoon slot for an attractive and practical addition to your table
cons: The colors may look a bit different in person, but this is a minor concern

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat fragile because it’s pottery.
customer_reviews.text: Nice pottery sugar bowl. Size is just right. I like the cutout in the lid for the spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Cute and simple
customer_reviews.text: It was really difficult to find a simple sugar bowl like I grew up with. This was the closest I could find. I like everything about it except for the way there is a lip on the inside of the bowl for the lid. I wish the bowl part was wider open for easier access and no lip because the sugar collects there. It is a nice size, and durable but not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! Not too big, not too small, has a slot for a spoon, blends with my decor, reasonably priced. so many sugar bowls don't have a place for the spoon to stick out, but that was my first criteria. This one checked all the other boxes as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rita A

customer_reviews.title: Cute & good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I know this is not a butter dish, but I use it as a butter dish and am pleased. I would buy this again for butter or for sugar (whatever). It is cute and made well and works as promised. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: SueZQ

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great deal. Love the fact that there is a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great deal. Love the fact that there is a spoon slot in the top. The wide base I thought would be a problem, but it does not stand out on the counter. Very cute piece and our guests always comment on how cute it i.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen B.

customer_reviews.title: Sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like it is, a mini honey pot if it is too small for your sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Ceil

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Had to replace a plain white one that I broke (it came with a matching china spoon, which had previously broken and I replaced it with a silver spoon). This one doesn't come with a spoon, and my tiny silver spoon fit perfectly in the space for it. Really lovely.
customer_reviews.author: brian dean

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful little sugar pot!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little pot for my sugar. It's very delicate, though, so not for someone with little kids. I wish it were a little larger, but it's beautiful. Makes me smile when I see it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Of COURSE I'll have tea with this
customer_reviews.text: The celadon color is a perfect throwback to a time we reveled in modernity. I love the artful shape.
customer_reviews.author: K Goldbie

customer_reviews.title: great sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: I loved this sugar bowl with the cover, perfect color for my kitchen and love the size, I ordered a small spoon to put in the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: a sweet little sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: I have had my china for some time now but wasn't able to get all the serving pieces when I bought it. I was delighted to find the sugar bowl on Amazon.com, and my little sugar bowl is just what I expected it to be. It is, of course, useful and pretty enough to be displayed on my baker's rack.
customer_reviews.author: suzy

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: We got this & the matching creamer for our kid's anniversary, it is sweet, it is very pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Keezer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This sugar bowl is perfect. I love the opening for the spoon handle.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rebecca Owens

customer_reviews.title: Classic covered sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: I love this sugar bowl. Nice crisp white without being stark, classic design, and a spot in the lid for the spoon. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5, is that now we have to search for the perfect spoon to fit in it. I'm surprised portmeirion did not include one. One other thing to note, is that it did not look as rustic as it does one the website. For me, that was a good thing. It's really perfect, and is packaged in a nice box that makes it great for gift giving. I gave it with the matching creamer () to my sister for Christmas and she couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy Jane

customer_reviews.title: Modern and elegant
customer_reviews.text: I love how it looks and feels, the clean and simple yet sophisticated appearance of it. I keep it in my coffee bar, ready for use daily. It neatly hold a small coffee spoon with the cutout on the lid, love this feature!! Very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we expected to get. It came nicely packaged and looks great next to our other Portmeirion - Sophie Conran items. We liked it so much that we bought a second one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: The Bard & Vicar

customer_reviews.title: Great little sugar bowl.
customer_reviews.text: I love my little sugar bowl. The notch in the lid is plenty big enough for most any spoon. I love that it's simple, but has a little irregularity and character in the shape.
customer_reviews.author: slang955

customer_reviews.title: Lovely sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: It's lovely but the color is not exactly what I was hoping. ...still keeping it though.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Bridwell

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as a salt pig. It works well. It is nice looking as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Denzler

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, love the size I also got the matching creamer pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: CA mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Love the spoon slot and just the right size
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Sugar and Cream Set
customer_reviews.text: The lid feels a little thin. Still, the set is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Steward R. Christal

customer_reviews.title: Matches my other tablewear
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on my table. I like that it has a cut out area for the spoon. Now the lid sits properly
customer_reviews.author: Susan J.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: So gorgeous and I love the opening for the sugar spoon to come through! The color isn't quite as vibrant as shown on the screen, but is still really beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: KKSN

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Finally, found a sugar bowl with hole on the lid for the spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what she wanted
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my mother- she loves it! Super fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: Our old sugar bowl was well-loved, but it was cracked and unsightly. So I went looking for a new one, and was surprised that a good sugar bowl is hard to find. Then I searched on Amazon and discovered Sophie Conran. The photos were helpful, but I didn't know if I would really like the sugar bowl when it arrived. So I was delighted to open the box and find this simply beautiful sugar bowl. It's attractive, it's functional and I was pleased with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not white-powder blue
customer_reviews.text: It’s good quality and pretty but more of a powdered blue and not white. Pretty, just not white.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Hanel

customer_reviews.title: very nice item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item and the creamer that matches it. Very nice item. It is good quality and it arrived looking just like the photo, and in very nice packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa123

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Nice smaller size - holds about 1 1/2 cups sugar, and my sugar spoon fits perfectly. Looks very nice on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: MEH

customer_reviews.title: Just like a Diner
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little container that is perfect for my rustic looking sugar cubes. The slot is just the right size for my rose embossed sugar tongs, too. It is getting plenty of use for tea and coffee. When my father-in-law came over with his coffee purchased from a famous Seattle based coffee chain and needed to add his sugar and cream, I had all he needed right on the table. It all looked very cute, just like in a diner! Then he asked for a swizzle stick and because of Amazon, I also had those cute little spoons to stir with, too. Can it get any better?
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Doll

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Perfect size! Love the whole for the spoon!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Conti

customer_reviews.title: cutout in lid for spoon
customer_reviews.text: we now have a sugar bowl in our home, because we're civilized humans. i got a nice set of flatware that came with a sugar spoon, again, the civilized human thing, so i got one with a little cutout in the lid for my fancy spoon.
customer_reviews.author: pseudonym

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and functional
customer_reviews.text: One of my sons broke my last sugar dish so I bought this one as a replacement. I already had a porcelain spoon, but if you don't have one you'll need one or else you'll have an unfilled hole in the top of the cover. It works fine and so far my sons haven't broken this one.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom of Boys

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: It would be awesome if it had a matching spoon! Other then that it's a good size and it's simple
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: My sugar bowl arrived right on time. It was beautifully wrapped. I just love the color and the style. It could be a handmade piece.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.L.

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Sugar Bowl
customer_reviews.text: This is also an exquisite piece of dinnerware. I hope to collect more pieces of this dinnerware, I truly admire the style and color.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Shneck

customer_reviews.title: Love this sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: Love this sugar bowl! Just the right size, and the pale blue/aqua color is lovely. Comes in a beautiful gift box. The creamer makes a nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Nice,  but too small and awkward
customer_reviews.text: I looked and looked for a sugar bowl with a notched top to allow for a spoon to replace our chipped everyday bowl. It is too small for everyday use however, needing to be refilled weekly. Also, being so small makes it difficult to feel secure lifting and holding it while using it. The design would have been better if it had handles on it. One the plus side, I like its simplicity. It would be a nice part of an overall set, just not the best choice as a separate.
customer_reviews.author: RSimon

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this sugar dish
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this sugar dish, others commented on how small it is, but if you don't use a lot of sugar it shouldn't be an issue. I purchased it to use it for honey and it seems to do the job very well. I also purchased the creamer, utensil jar and the butter dish. they are all a lovely white and seem well made.
customer_reviews.author: P. C. Elliot

customer_reviews.title: sweet little salt pot
customer_reviews.text: I love this covered salt pot and had a little wooden spoon that fit in it perfectly. The covered butter dish I also ordered with it look great together on the counter and are very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara from Torrance, CA

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but cheap
customer_reviews.text: This sugar pot is pretty but very thin and easily breakable. Be extremely careful setting the lid down on your marble counter because it will shatter quite easily. I am also disappointed this product is made in China. I read an article about Sophie Conran that indicated her products were made in Europe.
customer_reviews.author: Mentally in Paris

customer_reviews.title: Love this sugar bowl.
customer_reviews.text: This looks really cute on my counter. It is small but holds a nice amount of sugar if you’re only using it to add sugar to coffee and tea. It doesn’t come with a sugar spoon but and small spoon you already have fits in nicely.
customer_reviews.author: MsV8r

customer_reviews.title: Lovely small sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: Lovely small sugar bowl with cut out for a small spoon. The ridges make it look almost hand-made. If you use a big spoon and lots of sugar this might be too small for you, but perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: LuluCooks

customer_reviews.title: Looks great sitting on the counter
customer_reviews.text: Very well made - so attractive you can leave it out on the counter. It does not come with a small spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy2SkyMar

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Exactly what I wanted and matches my Crate and Barrel dishes perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Snow Girl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Much thinner and more fragile than I hoped. Grayer than I thought it looked in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Nanna Julie

customer_reviews.title: real nice
customer_reviews.text: Wanted one of these sugar bowls for years that has the spoon rest it holds about a cup of sugar easy to lift and hold I choose white so it would go with anything I put in the kitchen came pretty quick price was not bad
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is nice size
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it very cute and I can use will in my kitchen with other matching dishes
customer_reviews.author: Juana

customer_reviews.title: Good size for two-person household
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed. No longer need to refill a cute, tiny sugar bowl every three days.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Great sugar bowl!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this little sugar bowl! For me, size is just right, not too small and not too large. Goes well with other dishware. Very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: You will be very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, I also ordered the creamer, both are just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Tough Lady

customer_reviews.title: but was given as a gift and liked very much
customer_reviews.text: The color is pale, but was given as a gift and liked very much.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty enough and very functional. Can't ask for anything more. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: Peter L

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dinnerware,and this was just too cute to pass up. The Tiffany blue color is soft and exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: A. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Sweet sugar bowl!
customer_reviews.text: It's just a sugar bowl. no frills. but there's just something about it that I love so much! sure it doesn't come with a spoon but this just means you can be picky and buy your own spoon that fits perfectly and holds the right about of sugar you use. Great bowl! 4 stars instead of 5 only because it doesn't come with a spoon.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hyde

customer_reviews.title: love love love
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how long I've been looking for a sugar bowl with a lid AND spoon slot. It's beautiful and more elegant than the alternative pottery types that are out there. Caution to klutzy people, this product is very delicate and with break easily! You may want to order 2 so you have a backup for breakage.
customer_reviews.author: annr

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Functional ( hard to spill) and graceful on the table. The bottom tends to scratch the wood table. I've put is a Kona wood coaster, they look. Good together
customer_reviews.author: Not too old

customer_reviews.title: a beautiful high quality dish but the lids are delicate and ...
customer_reviews.text: a beautiful high quality dish but the lids are delicate and highly breakable....I've broken two lids already. signed, clumsy ! lol !
customer_reviews.author: D. H. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this sugar dish, as odd as that sounds. It's nicely designed. I especially like the hole in the lid for for the spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Laird

customer_reviews.title: Nice peice
customer_reviews.text: Holds enough for a few days. Nice classic look. Very happy with this sugar bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Bogart

customer_reviews.title: sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking porcelaine bowl, but really very small. It would hold just a little sugar and you be filling-up this bowl every day! If you're using sugar on a daily basis in coffee and tea, I would not recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: the dutch house

product_meta.title: Portmeirion Sophie Conran Covered Sugar (White)
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteThe Sophie Conran Collection was designed exclusively for Portmeirion. This collection is as durable and functional as it is beautiful. Sophie is part of the world-famous Conran lifestyle and culinary dynasty. The simplistic and organic nature of this collection makes it perfect for every style and taste. Each beautifully delicate item meets the hard-wearing needs of today's family and culinary experts. Available in White, Bisque and Celadon, the look can be as simple or diverse as your tastes demand.

AMAZON.COM
This simple, beautiful, and functional sugar bowl is part of an entire tableware and bakeware collection designed by Sophie Conran, an English food writer with her own gourmet pie company. Conran infuses her namesake tableware with a flowing organic nature and tactile expression, as evidenced by the ridges and dipped rims that recall handcrafted pottery. Made of porcelain expressly for Portmeirion, the collection comes in glossy white with select pieces available in cool blue celadon and a creamy biscuit color. 

 The Sophie Conran sugar bowl is formed in a compellingly rotund shape that harmonizes with the collection's cream jug and teapot. A lip at the rim holds in place the domed lid, which features an unusual knob and a cutout hole for a spoon. The durable, chip-resistant porcelain bowl and lid clean up without fuss in the dishwasher, and also may be used to warm food in a microwave or oven, for example, to liquefy crystallized honey. Combined with the creamer, the set makes a great gift for those who appreciate a rustic yet modern look on the table. --Ann Bieri
feature_bullets: SWEET AS CAN BE: This is perfect way to keep your sugar fresh and accessible for morning coffee or afternoon tea. This pretty Sophie Conran for Portmeirion covered sugar bowl is the perfect accompaniment to your teapot and cream jug.

MAKE EVERY DAY BEAUTIFUL: Designed by Sophie Conran, each piece is beautifully tactile, having the look of being hand-thrown. With Sophie's philosophy that every day should be a beautiful day, the collection is both versatile and practical - the jugs morph into vases and roasting dishes take center stage on the table.

STYLE AND CONVENIENCE COMBINED: As well as creating elegant dinner parties and relaxed breakfasts, the Sophie Conran for Portmeirion collection moves with ease from the dishwasher to the microwave, the freezer to the oven, making it one of the most functional and stylish collections all in one.

TIMELESS DESIGNS: Portmeirion was founded by legendary ceramic designer Susan William-Ellis in 1960 and has remained at the forefront of contemporary design ever since. Renowned for our tableware and giftware, Portmeirion produces beautiful and unique collections all of which are made to the highest standard to be enjoyed every day.
PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS: Package contains (1) Portmeirion Sophie Conran Covered Sugar. Made of Fine Porcelain. 11 oz Capacity. Dishwasher, Microwave, Freezer and Oven Safe.
